item.title: Adding Facebook Login with react
item.description: Sometimes you just can’t get away from facebook. Here’s a quick tutorial on how to add facebook login to your react app. First you need to create a facebook app, which is an involved process especially if you want to let, you know, other people log in to your app. Getting your app approved and otherwise up and running here is left as an excersize for you to figure out.
